TABLE.NAME: local_autocompgrade_courses
TABLE.COMMENT: Courses to be listed in the "Grade assignment competencies", along with any properties that might help group them

FIELD.NAME: endyear
FIELD.COMMENT: Year when the course ends so the results can be consolidated

FIELD.NAME: endtrimester
FIELD.COMMENT: Trimester when the course is finished, so the results can be consolidated

FIELD.NAME: currentresults
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicate if this history record contains the current course results

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Date and time when the results were registered in the history

FIELD.NAME: usercreated
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user who registered the results

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Date and time when the results were last modified

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user who last modified the results

TABLE.NAME: local_autocompgrade_histcomp
TABLE.COMMENT: Competency grades for each student in the history of course results

FIELD.NAME: usercompcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of user competency in course

FIELD.NAME: proficiency
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicate if the competency is proficient or not

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The course grade assigned for the competency
